subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks:
Sabella thoracica
,
B. variegata
and
B. melanostigma
are synonyms. Although
S. thoracica
and
B. variegata
have priority over
B. melanostigma
, those names have not been used since 1856 , except
B. variegata
by
Perkins ( 1984 )
. Conversely the name
melanostigma
has been in frequent use since its inception and is the name used by the curators of most museums. Therefore, to conserve the name
melanostigma
, the precedence of
S. thoracica
and
B. variegata
should be waived (Art. 23 , Sect. 9 , International Code of
Zoological Nomenclature, 2000
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bispira paraporifera
Tovar-Hernández and Salazar-Vallejo, 2006
Bispira paraporifera
Tovar-Hernández and Salazar-Vallejo, 2006
: 35
–36, Fig. 6 . Type locality: Mexico , Quintana Roo, Puerto Aventuras, on dead coral. Type material: LACM-AHF (HT).

subSubSection.paragraph: Records: Only known for the type locality.
